no_models_tip: No models available. Please add models in Settings.
type_exists_warning: Type already exists. Please choose another or remove first.
tip_baseurl: Recommend configuring BaseUrl for domestic access.
guide_alias_bullet_1: Used to distinguish multiple configurations of the same type, e.g. lab, prod
guide_alias_bullet_3: Alias is optional; a timestamp alias will be generated. Prefer English letters/numbers with hyphen
guide_alias_bullet_4: When the base type configuration is incomplete, the system will automatically fall back to another alias of the same type
guide_deepseek_key: API Key: apply on DeepSeek platform
guide_qianfan_key: Access Key / Secret Key: get from Qianfan console
guide_qianfan_models: Models: fill models supported by Qianfan docs
guide_dashscope_key: API Key: get from Alibaba Cloud console
guide_compat_bullet_1: Use vendor API Key and configure compatible BaseUrl (e.g. DeepSeek/DashScope) to call with OpenAI API format
guide_compat_bullet_2: Fill compatible BaseUrl and key from vendor (e.g. DeepSeek, DashScope)
guide_compat_bullet_3: You can use OpenAI SDK to call compatible providers
empty_models_desc: Click Add in the top-right, then fill API Key, BaseUrl and models.
confirm_delete: Delete this conversation? This cannot be undone
